column3: Looks good, but I was waiting for https://github.com/jgarzik/univalue/pull/14 to be merged first.\n
Agree with @sipa: Let's wait for @laanwj open PR there.\n

Not sure what is blocking jgarzik/univalue#14.

Need to move this along though for the 0.12 branch. Maybe we could create a univalue fork under bitcoin.
I think a fork of UniValue under the github bitcoin identity would make sense.\n

Updated. Make sure to fetch https://github.com/bitcoin/univalue (and not jgarzik) when doing

```
$ contrib/devtools/git-subtree-check.sh src/univalue
```

ACK
